title: Re-enactments
medium: Two-channel video (color, sound), 19 drawings, two photographs, one hand-colored photograph, 16 newspaper clippings, one print
credits: Gift of The Speyer Family Foundation, Kathy and Richard S. Fuld, Jr., Marie-Josée and Henry R. Kravis, Patricia Phelps de Cisneros, Anna Marie and Robert F. Shapiro, The Julia Stoschek Foundation, Düsseldorf, and Committee on Media Funds
